StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetLeadsProspectReportByContact]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @FromDate date.me, @ToDate date.me, @OrgUnitId int )
AS SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
Select l.LeadID, isnull(ContactTypeID,0) as ContactTypeID, isnull(ContactOutcomeID,0) as ContactOutcomeID, [Date] as AchievedDate, LSD.StatusDisposi.onID, isnull(ContactSourceID,0) as ContactSourceID,isnull(DualContactSourceID,0) as DualContactSourceID from [dbo].[Contact] C inner join dbo.Lead l on l.LeadId = C.LeadID inner join dbo.Recruiter R on R.RecruiterID = L.AssignedRecruiterID inner join dbo.LeadStatusDisposi.on LSD on L.LeadID = lsd.LeadID where C.[Date] between @FromDate and @ToDate and (R.Organiza.onID in( Select Region from [vwOrgUnitIDs] where HQ = @OrgUnitID union Select RS from [vwOrgUnitIDs] where HQ = @OrgUnitID union Select RS from [vwOrgUnitIDs] where Region = @OrgUnitID union Select RSS from [vwOrgUnitIDs] where HQ = @OrgUnitID union Select RSS from [vwOrgUnitIDs] where Region = @OrgUnitID union Select RSS from [vwOrgUnitIDs] where RS = @OrgUnitID union Select RSS from [vwOrgUnitIDs] where RSS = @OrgUnitID union Select @OrgUnitID ) or @OrgUnitID = 0 or @OrgUnitID is null)
